actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of a parcel of unused agricultural land in Dos Palos, California, to the Dos Palos Ag Boosters for use as a farm school.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to convey specified land in Dos Palos, California, to the Dos Palos Ag Boosters for use as a farm school. States that upon request of the Boosters such conveyance may be made to the Dos Palos School District. Requires, as compensation, that the transferee pay to the Secretary the fair market value of the land conveyed. Directs the Secretary to determine the fair market value.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of a parcel of unused agricultural land in Dos Palos, California, to the Dos Palos Ag Boosters for use as a farm school.
